game.name: Magikmon
game.description:
The Wizard-Wannabe has already got late for his first day in a Magic School. He will have to face off the multiple witty teachers, mean students and wild magical creatures. But he needs your help to complete multiple missions in this brand new adventure challenge. Would you like to help him during his unique mission? Join Magikmon and be prepared to find your way out through the dark and murky gardens of the magic school! Do every possible effort to train the wonderful team of Magikmon!

Solving the challenges will allow you to explore a magical world and make sure to grab your own combat team along the way! Luckily, Magikmon is blessed with matchless special powers and properties so do not forget to use them to protect you against the odds during the journey. Challenge the magikmon and clear them from the screen and plan a strategy to capture them to build up your own squad in this HTML5 RPG maze game! Remember you also have to train them up then to transform into the badest fighter around.

There are multiple types of monsters to capture around in this cute wizardry challenge. You and your magical world will have a big threat from the deadly monsters. Be careful and try to be fast to capture your own to defend yourself with! Defeat monsters and win battles to earn money through which you can also buy upgrades and enhance the skills and strength of your good monsters! Good luck to complete all your missions timely to be the greatest monster tamer!
